statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_history FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female' AND medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE discharge_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, reason_for_visit FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM patients LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_name;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointments.status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, prescription_id, medication_name, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT appointment_date, reason, doctor FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, address, phone_number FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' AND prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Once daily' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT full_name, gender, occupation FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Medical_records ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, allergy_name, severity FROM Allergies WHERE severity = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM Medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT full_name, occupation FROM Patients WHERE occupation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
